x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.description: This fix script applies from SD to Tokyo upgrade. There is schema changes on sys_cs_auto_resolution_configuration table which will require backward compatibilty, so updating the newly introduced columns for any existing IAR configuration using this fix script
